title: Understanding Column Elements
text: Think about how data is organized in a spreadsheet. Each column represents a specific category or type of data.

title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Consider what each column in a worksheet typically represents. Is it a category, a grouping, or something else?

hintAnswer: how data is grouped in the worksheet
title: What are column elements?
text: Columns in a worksheet are used to group data. What is the correct term for this grouping?
choices: how data is grouped in the worksheet
